**Cira IV-27**

Status: **COMPLETED**

Cost: **$589,718.00**

**The Cira IV-27 is an update of the old and reliable Cira IV, and can take 300 tons of payload to LKO for less koins than the old version.**

Unfortunately, this project's on hold due to the overheat of the LV-Ns.....

![dedpkx6.png](http://i.imgur.com/dedpkx6.png)

What I've been reading is you do **NOT** want to have LV-N's connected directly to a quad coupler. Having LV-T400, or better yet, LV-T800 fuel tanks connecting each LV-N to the coupler seems to be the way to fix the over heating issue. The long fuel tanks dissipate the heat from the engines at a better rate and keep them cooler during long burns. The quad coupler on the other hand causes the engines to rapidly over heat when they are all connected directly to it.

Otherwise, beautiful lifter you've got there. And a nice transfer vehicle. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yeah, I know those LV-Ns need to be moved, I just dont feel like it - in fact that whole project was kind of badly thought out. Might have to scrap it. 

Ah well, 200 Cira-IV-27 downloads! This lifter series has gotten nearly 2000 downloads, between the Cira III, IV, IV-27, and VI! Thank you everyone, I'm glad you like it!
Over 210 downloads today!
